text: Þis is þara XV hida boc æt clearan þæ Edmund cing gæbocodæ Ælfswiþæ on ece yrfæ.
Ðis synd þa landgemera to Clearan.
Ærest þær merc broc scyt on seolesburnan of mearc broce on punges done middewearde þonon on ðone greatan hlinc easteweardne þæt þonon on ðone fearngaran easteweardne & swa on ceacgan seað.
Þæt swa suð andlang gemeres þæt be easten þone holancumb up on dune þæt swa on þa byrgelsas þæt swa to meres byrig westan on ða dic.
Þæt swa &lang dic to þan ealdan wege.
Up on brochylle &lang hlinca þæt on pirgraf þær andlang herpaðes to <weardsetle> swa &lang wic herpaðes be westan stutes hylle.

Þanon andlang þæs feldes swa on beferbroces heafod andlang broces ut on alerburnan andlang brocan burnan on gagel broce þonon on ðone ge mer hagan &lang hagan on seolesburnan & swa up andlang burnan þæt eft on mer broce.
